author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
It’s unclear what made left-leaning elected officials so emboldened to blatantly disrespect and stalk law enforcement, especially in the performance of their duties, but that is becoming far too common.

Aftyn Behn, a Democratic Tennessee State Representative, posted a video bragging about how she followed ICE troopers in her car to harass them. It’s unclear if she thought the video made her appear morally superior, but I would never recommend interfering with federal enforcement to get clicks.

Aftyn Behn, a Democrat TN State Rep, posted a video of herself ADMITTING to stalking and bullying local police and ICE agents who were carrying out immigration enforcement.

Interfering with immigration enforcement is a CRIME.
title: Democrat rep brags about bullying ICE and local police with her "girl squad" because of how much they love illegal immigrants

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
If transgenderism was inherently a thing, so much so it could be labeled as “natural,” then there would be no reason to medically transition. However, considering that the left woke up one day and decided that gender and sex are distinct, despite the logic not holding up, we now have a mental health crisis in this country.

One trans activist decided to deliver this message to the unwoke masses to stick it to the Trump Administration.


NEW: Transgender activists have unveiled a massive trans flag at Yosemite National Park to teach President Trump a lesson.

The queers and transgenders want the world to know that being transgender is “natural.”

The flag was hung a whopping 1500 feet up the rock and spanned…
title: Cringe Trans Activists Have Unveiled A Message For You at Yosemite National Park: “Trans Is Natural”

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Rep. Nancy Mace vowed to drop her nudes on the House floor. Today’s show welcomed her as a special guest.

According to Newsweek:

Republican Representative Nancy Mace of South Carolina on Tuesday displayed a still of what she said was her "naked silhouette" from a video her former fiance took without her consent.

According to Mace, she is taking on the issue of Peeping T
title: EXCLUSIVE: Nancy Mace Gets Tough Questions from Crowder Following the Congressional 'Nude' Situation

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Steven Crowder went on Piers Morgan Uncensored to debate the use of the *N-Word, and the show couldn’t live up to the name.

"We are not talking about wanting to go out and denigrate Black people with the N-word. What we are discussing right now in this country is people being silenced and terrified of losing everything, even if they say the wrong word in the right context where they are condemning prejudice," Crowder said. "It's a political weapon and it's used selectively."

Per the censored quote that was aired:

“When we're talking about this new song — and as a comedian and as a
title: Watch: Why Piers Morgan Censored Crowder's Interview Over The N-Word

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Today, I learned that faking town halls for presidential campaigns is a thing, but only when you use that footage on top of real town halls. And not only could Biden not do either, but when he tried to fake a town hall, it was so bad they couldn’t even use the fictitious footage.

Some in his campaign tried to chalk it up to bad lighting, despite paying millions to make this happen. Whether or not that’s the case is for you to decide, but the conclusion remains the same regardless of the premise: this was the most pathetic and reprehensible thing the left did to the American people and the former Vice President.

The Biden campaign spent millions to stage a fake town hall — and it was so bad, they couldn’t even use any of it for campaign commercials.

Some people blamed Biden being incoherent, some
title: We're not sure what's worse in this CNN clip: That Biden spent millions on a fake town hall? Or that they couldn't use ANY OF IT?

author: Brodigan
description:
Steven was on Piers Morgan Uncensored and Piers Morgan Uncensored couldn’t live up to the name. Find the full segment here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NdZsVIw1d8Q

Representative Nancy Mace promised to drop her nudes on the House floor. Former FBI Director James Comey, fresh off calling for the 86’ing of President Donald Trump, is now getting invited to do the late night circuit. President Donald Trump has announced the defense system called the Golden Dome. What does it do and how does it work? We’ll tell you.

PIERS MORG
title: The "N-Word" Fallout: Why Piers Morgan Censored My Interview - GUEST: Nancy Mace (Sources)

author: Brodigan
description:
I'd like to take a moment to appreciate what I feel is brilliant political messaging. Because we here at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website have been sarcastically referring to the Biden Administration as the People Who Controlled Joe Biden Administration, not knowing how accurate that was. Donald Trump dropped a Truth Social post today along those same lines.

Don't blame Joe Biden, who we all feel bad for and are praying for. Blame the people who propped him up, manipulated him, and made all the decisions for being the ones who were destroying America.

pic.twitter.com/HWiXsuoJ8V
— Rapid Response 47 (@RapidResponse47) May 20,
title: Donald Trump DEFENDS Joe Biden against the people who controlled the Biden WH... who were the ones REALLY destroying America

author: Brodigan
description:
If you wanted to know why the Democrat establishment hates podcasts and people being allowed to express opinions on the internets, look no further than Bernie Sanders sitting down with Andrew Schulz. When the Democrat Party doesn't control the content like they do on CNN or in the New York Times, they get called out on their bullplop. Like, for example, the way they call anyone who gets in their way various kinds of -ists guilty of -isms.

Akaash Singh asked about "Bernie Bros," and how when Bernie ran against Hillary, his supporters were bothered as "bros" and called both racists and sexist. You have to remember, the ONLY reason why you wouldn't vote for a Democr
title: Bernie Sanders admits out loud what we all know... Democrats lie about opponents being racist and sexist
